project_plan.name: Directory Monitoring Script in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that monitors a specified directory for new files and logs their names and creation times to a log file.

task.name: Set up the directory watcher using the `watchdog` library
Implement logic to capture the name and creation time of new files
Create a logging mechanism to log the file name and creation time to a log file
Write tests to verify that the directory watcher detects new files correctly and logs the information properly
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure functionality
